title: Wall Street Breakfast July 1: Stock Futures Slide After S&P 500 Notches Worst First Half Since 1970
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Stock futures slide after S&P 500 notches worst first half since 1970. Coinbase is selling geo-location data to U.S. immigration enforcement agency. McConnell looks to block $52B in chips funding over spending packages. White House official says stablecoin legislation may become law by end-2022: CoinDesk. Catch today’s WSB article here.
